request: If User Away, on Vacation or Sleeping Then Door is Locked.
If User Away, on Vacation or Sleeping Then Gas Stove is off.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Control Gas Stove Based on User State"
when
    Item User_Status received update
then
    if (User_Status.state == "Away" || User_Status.state == "Vacation" || User_Status.state == "Sleeping") {
        Gas_Stove.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: If Fire Sprinkler is on Then Water Valve is on.
openhab_code:
```javascript
rule "Activate Water Valve when Fire Sprinkler is On"
when
    Item Fire_Sprinkler changed to ON
then
    Water_Valve.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: If User Away or on Vacation Then Induction Cooktop is off.
openhab_code:
```plaintext
.rule "Turn Off Induction Cooktop When User Away or on Vacation"
when
    Item User_Status changed
then
    if (User_Status.state == "Away" || User_Status.state == "Vacation") {
        Induction_Cooktop.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: If User Away or on Vacation Then Coffee Maker is off.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn Off Coffee Maker When User is Away or on Vacation"
when
    Item User_Status changed
then
    if(User_Status.state == "Away" || User_Status.state == "Vacation") {
        Coffee_Maker.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: If Heater is on Then Air Conditioner is off.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Control AC based on Heater status"
when
    Item Heater changed to ON
then
    AirConditioner.sendCommand(OFF)
end
```

request: Turn off the gas stove, if the smoke is detected.
openhab_code:
```
rule "Turn off gas stove on smoke detection"
when
    Item Smoke_Detector status changed to ON
then
    Gas_Stove.sendCommand(OFF)
end
```

request: Turn on the heater, if the temperature is below the threshold.
openhab_code:
```javascript
rule "Turn on Heater if Temperature Below Threshold"
when
    Item TemperatureSensor changedto BELOW_THRESHOLD
then
    Heater.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: The lights (in a bedroom, hallway, etc.) must be turned on if the motion sensor is active.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Turn on lights with motion detection"
when
    Item MotionSensor changed to ON
then
    // Specify the lights to turn on:
    BedroomLight.sendCommand(ON)
    HallwayLight.sendCommand(ON)
end
```

request: When sending a voice message if it is on Thursday then turn on the TV.
openhab_code:
```dsl
rule "Turn on TV on voice message Thursday"
when
    VoiceMessageReceived  // This is an imaginary trigger. Replace as per context/binding.
then
    if (now.getDayOfWeek() == 4) {  // 4 corresponds to Thursday
        TV.sendCommand(ON)  // Assuming 'TV' is your item for the TV.
    }
end
```

request: Allow sending SMS only if it is requested by flood-alert or energy-alerts or humidity-alert or mail-arrived or medicine-reminder or presence-change-text or ready-for-rain or laundry-monitor apps.
openhab_code:
```scala
rule "Send SMS on specific alerts"
when
    Item floodAlert received command ON or
    Item energyAlert received command ON or 
    Item humidityAlert received command ON or
    Item mailArrived received command ON or
    Item medicineReminder received command ON or
    Item presenceChangeText received command ON or
    Item readyForRain received command ON or
    Item laundryMonitor received command ON
then
    // Replace with the appropriate action to send SMS, implemented according to your setup.
    sendSMS("Your mobile number", "Alert received. Please check.")
end
```

request: Allow unlocking the front door only if it is requested by enhanced-auto-lock-door app.
Allow water valve to be closed only if the fire-sprinkler was not on in the last 5 hours.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Close Water Valve If Sprinkler Not Activated"
when
    Item FireSprinkler changed to OFF
then
    // Check if the sprinkler wasn't on in the last 5 hours
    if ((now.minusHours(5)).isAfter(FireSprinkler.lastChange) && WaterValve.state == ON) {
        WaterValve.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: Allow water valve to be closed only if water leak sensor sensed wet within 1 minute.
Allow any light to be turned on only if the system is not on vacation mode.
Allow light to be switched on only if user is at home.
openhab_code:
```java
rule "Switch on Light if User is at Home"
when
    Item UserPresence changed to ON
then
    if (UserPresence.state == ON) {
        Light.sendCommand(ON)
    }
end
```

request: Allow hallway light to get turned on only if the hallway motion sensor has tripped within 20 sec.
Allow AC to be switched on only if the heater is off.
Allow living room window to be opened only if both heater and AC are off.
openhab_code:
```javascript
_rule "Allow Opening Living Room Window"
when
    Item Heater_Switch changed
    or
    Item AC_Switch changed
then
    if (Heater_Switch.state == OFF && AC_Switch.state == OFF) {
        livingRoomWindow_Window_Can_Open.sendCommand(ON)
    } else {
        livingRoomWindow_Window_Can_Open.sendCommand(OFF)
    }
end
```

request: Allow turning off thermostat only if lastly it was on within 120 sec.
